wikipedia_page.main: Sir Thomas Bunbury, KH (1783–1857) was a British soldier and colonialist.

response: *Sir Thomas Bunbury, 1st Baronet (died 1682) of the Bunbury baronets
*Thomas Bunbury (British Army general) (1783–1857), British soldier and colonialist
*Thomas Bunbury (British Army officer, born 1791) (1791–1862), service included Peninsular War, Australia, New Zealand and India
